com.constantcontact.v2

Interface CampaignService


  • public interface CampaignService
    Retrofit interface for Campaign and Campaign Schedule calls against the Constant Contact API.

    See Using Email Campaigns on the Constant Contact Developer Website

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getCampaign

        @GET(value="v2/emailmarketing/campaigns/{campaignId}")
retrofit2.Call<Campaign> getCampaign(@Path(value="campaignId")
                                                                                            java.lang.String campaignId,
                                                                                            @Query(value="updateSummary")
                                                                                            boolean updateSummary)
        Get a Campaign
        Parameters:
        campaignId - ID of the campaign
        updateSummary - Set to true to ask the server to get the newest tracking info
        Returns:
        an Observable that emits a Campaign

      • getCampaigns

        @GET(value="v2/emailmarketing/campaigns")
retrofit2.Call<Paged<Campaign>> getCampaigns(@Query(value="limit")
                                                                                       int limit,
                                                                                       @Query(value="status")
                                                                                       CampaignStatus status)
        Get a Paged collection of Campaign
        Parameters:
        limit - Size of page to return (1-500)
        status - CampaignStatus to filter by
        Returns:
        an Observable that emits Paged Campaigns

      • getCampaigns

        @GET(value="v2/emailmarketing/campaigns")
retrofit2.Call<Paged<Campaign>> getCampaigns(@Query(value="limit")
                                                                                       int limit,
                                                                                       @Query(value="modified_since")
                                                                                       java.lang.String date,
                                                                                       @Query(value="status")
                                                                                       CampaignStatus status)
        Get a Paged collection of Campaign
        Parameters:
        limit - Size of page to return (1-500)
        date - Date to specify retrieval of campaigns that have been modified since then, in ISO-8601 format
        status - CampaignStatus to filter by
        Returns:
        an Observable that emits Paged Campaigns

      • getCampaigns

        @GET(value="v2/emailmarketing/campaigns?next={next}")
retrofit2.Call<Paged<Campaign>> getCampaigns(@Path(value="next")
                                                                                                   java.lang.String nextLink)
        Get a Paged collection of Campaign
        Parameters:
        nextLink - Next link that comes from a previous campaign collection call
        Returns:
        an Observable that emits Paged Campaigns

      • createCampaign

        @POST(value="v2/emailmarketing/campaigns")
retrofit2.Call<Campaign> createCampaign(@Body
                                                                                   Campaign campaign)
        Create a Campaign
        Parameters:
        campaign - Campaign
        Returns:
        an Observable that emits a Campaign

      • updateCampaign

        @PUT(value="v2/emailmarketing/campaigns/{campaignId}")
retrofit2.Call<Campaign> updateCampaign(@Body
                                                                                               Campaign campaign,
                                                                                               @Path(value="campaignId")
                                                                                               java.lang.String campaignId)
        Update a Campaign
        Parameters:
        campaign - Campaign
        campaignId - ID of the Campaign
        Returns:
        an Observable that emits a Campaign

      • deleteCampaign

        @DELETE(value="v2/emailmarketing/campaigns/{campaignId}")
retrofit2.Call<retrofit2.Response> deleteCampaign(@Path(value="campaignId")
                                                                                                            java.lang.String campaignId)
        Delete a Campaign

        (Note: the campaign will still exist in the account, and can be restored from the website.)

        Parameters:
        campaignId - String - ID of the Campaign
        Returns:
        an Observable that emits a Response

      • sendTestCampaign

        @POST(value="v2/emailmarketing/campaigns/{campaignId}/tests")
retrofit2.Call<TestSend> sendTestCampaign(@Body
                                                                                                        TestSend testSend,
                                                                                                        @Path(value="campaignId")
                                                                                                        java.lang.String campaignId)
        Send a TestSend of a Campaign
        Parameters:
        testSend - TestSend
        campaignId - ID of the Campaign
        Returns:
        an Observable that emits a TestSend

                                                                                                                  java.lang.String campaignId)
        Generate a CampaignPreview of a Campaign

        campaignId - ID of the Campaign
        Returns:
        an Observable that emits a CampaignPreview

      • scheduleCampaign

        @POST(value="v2/emailmarketing/campaigns/{campaignId}/schedules")
retrofit2.Call<CampaignSchedule> scheduleCampaign(@Body
                                                                                                                    CampaignSchedule campaignSchedule,
                                                                                                                    @Path(value="campaignId")
                                                                                                                    java.lang.String campaignId)
        Create a CampaignSchedule for a Campaign
        Parameters:
        campaignSchedule - CampaignSchedule
        campaignId - ID of the campaign
        Returns:
        an Observable that emits a CampaignSchedule

      • getCampaignSchedules

        @GET(value="v2/emailmarketing/campaigns/{campaignId}/schedules")
retrofit2.Call<java.util.List<CampaignSchedule>> getCampaignSchedules(@Path(value="campaignId")
                                                                                                                                       java.lang.String campaignId)
        Get a List of current CampaignSchedule of a Campaign

        (Note: Only scheduled campaigns will have schedules, no historical schedules currently exist)

        Parameters:
        campaignId - ID of the Campaign
        Returns:
        an Observable that emits a List of CampaignSchedules

      • getCampaignSchedule

        @GET(value="v2/emailmarketing/campaigns/{campaignId}/schedules/{scheduleId}")

        an Observable that emits a CampaignSchedule

      • deleteCampaignSchedule

        @DELETE(value="v2/emailmarketing/campaigns/{campaignId}/schedules/{scheduleId}")
retrofit2.Call<retrofit2.Response> deleteCampaignSchedule(@Path(value="campaignId")
                                                                                                                                           java.lang.String campaignId,
                                                                                                                                           @Path(value="scheduleId")
                                                                                                                                           java.lang.String scheduleId)
        Delete a CampaignSchedule (i.e. Unschedule the campaign)
        Parameters:
        campaignId - ID of the Campaign
        scheduleId - ID of the CampaignSchedule
        Returns:
        an Observable that emits a Response
